**Goethe University Frankfurt**

Econometrics in Economics (BSc Economics, Tutorial), Winter 2024/25

> This course provides an understanding of the fundamental methodologies of modern econometrics with the software R. Topics include probability theory, linear regression, finite sample distribution, asymptotic testing, large sample distribution, instrumental variables, time series analysis, panel data model, and machine learning.

Bachelor and Master Theses Supervision

> Topics include machine learning (e.g., XGBoost), blockchains (e.g., crypto tokens), etc.
